Bloodseeking Strike.name: Bloodseeking Strike
Bloodseeking Strike.flavor: You strike hard enough to crumple armor and hew the toughest hide, leaving your enemy open to further attack.
Bloodseeking Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grab the target. Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to Fortitude and Reflex against attempts to break your grab.

Mistblood Form.name: Mistblood Form
Mistblood Form.flavor: You draw upon your ties to vampire nature so that you can step between life and death to slay body and spirit.
Mistblood Form.effect: You gain phasing and deal full damage to insubstantial creatures.

Dance of Blood.name: Dance of Blood
Dance of Blood.flavor: Your enemies stagger under your imposing gaze and line up for slaughter.
Dance of Blood.effect: At the start of your turn, you can slide one adjacent enemy 1 square. You can then make a melee basic attack against that enemy as a free action provided that enemy is within your reach.
